title: Vegetarian Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: ['280g (10 oz) brown rice', '6 large fresh red or green peppers', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '3 tablespoons sherry', '1 (349g) carton Blue Dragon Tofu Firm Silken Style', '60g (2 oz) dried cranberries', '30g (1 oz) chopped pecans', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan', 'salt and pepper to taste']
